thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: At Pyeongchang Olympics, North Korean Guests Are Welcomed—and Restricted

author: Andrew Jeong
title: At Pyeongchang Olympics, North Korean Guests Are Welcomed—and Restricted
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Korea—How do you house and keep a close eye on hundreds of members of an enemy regime added at the last minute to the guest list of the world’s biggest sporting event?
Pyeongchang Olympic organizers appear to have found the answer.
One week into the Winter Games, organizers have managed to stage an Olympics that has been largely...
